sourcesContent:
import './Navigation.css'
import { Navbar, Container, Nav, NavDropdown, Modal } from 'react-bootstrap'
import { NavLink } from 'react-router-dom'
import { useContext, useState } from 'react'
import { AuthContext } from '../../context/auth.context'
import { FaShoppingCart, FaUser } from 'react-icons/fa';
import SignupPage from '../../pages/SignupPage/SignupPage'
import { MessageContext } from './../../context/message.context'
import SignupForm from '../SignupForm/SignupForm'
import LoginForm from '../LoginForm/LoginForm'
import MyModal from '../Modal/Modal'





const Navigation = () => {
    console.log('el user --->', AuthContext)


    const { user, logOutUser, isLoggedIn } = useContext(AuthContext)

    const [showModal, setShowModal] = useState(false)

    const openModal = () => setShowModal(true)
    const closeModal = () => setShowModal(false)


    const { showMessage } = useContext(MessageContext)


    const fireFinalActions = () => {
        closeModal()
        // loadCoasters()
        showMessage('Completado', 'Nuevo Usuario')
    }


    console.log('el user --->', user)

    return (
        <>
            <Navbar collapseOnSelect expand="lg" bg="dark" variant="dark" className='p-3' >

                <Navbar.Brand href="#home">gelioX</Navbar.Brand>
                <Navbar.Toggle aria-controls="responsive-navbar-nav" />
                <Navbar.Collapse id="responsive-navbar-nav">
                    <Nav className="mx-auto"></Nav>

                    <Nav>
                        <NavLink to="/" className="nav-link me-3 mx-4">Inicio</NavLink>
                        <NavLink to="/productos" className="nav-link me-3 mx-4">Productos</NavLink>
                        <NavDropdown title="Usuario" id="collasible-nav-dropdown" className='me-3 mx-4' >
                            {
                                isLoggedIn
                                    ?
                                    user && <>
                                        <NavDropdown.Item><NavLink to="/perfil" className="nav-link justify-content-end text-dark">Hola, {user.username}</NavLink></NavDropdown.Item>
                                        <NavDropdown.Item><NavLink to="/perfil" className="nav-link justify-content-end text-dark">Ver perfil</NavLink></NavDropdown.Item>
                                        {
                                            user.role == "SUPPLIER" && <>
                                                <NavDropdown.Divider />
                                                <NavDropdown.Item className="nav-link justify-content-end text-dark">Bienvenido, {user.role}</NavDropdown.Item>
                                                <NavDropdown.Item><NavLink to="/XXXX" className="nav-link justify-content-end text-dark">Nuevo Producto</NavLink></NavDropdown.Item>
                                            </>
                                        }
                                        {
                                            user.role == "ADMIN" && <>
                                                <NavDropdown.Divider />
                                                <NavDropdown.Item className="nav-link justify-content-end text-dark">Bienvenido, {user.role}</NavDropdown.Item>
                                                <NavDropdown.Item><NavLink to="/XXXXX" className="nav-link justify-content-end text-dark">BackOffice</NavLink></NavDropdown.Item>
                                            </>

                                        }
                                        {
                                            user.role == "SUPPLIER" || user.role == "ADMIN" && <>
                                                <NavDropdown.Item><NavLink to="/XXXX" className="nav-link justify-content-end text-dark">Nuevo Producto</NavLink></NavDropdown.Item>
                                            </>
                                        }
                                        <NavDropdown.Divider />
                                        <NavDropdown.Item className="nav-link text-center text-primary" onClick={logOutUser}><NavLink to="/">Cerrar sesión</NavLink></NavDropdown.Item>
                                    </>
                                    :
                                    <>
                                        <NavDropdown.Item className="nav-link text-dark" onClick={openModal}>Registro</NavDropdown.Item>
                                        <NavDropdown.Item className="nav-link text-dark" onClick={openModal1}>Iniciar sesión</NavDropdown.Item>
                                    </>
                            }
                        </NavDropdown>
                        <NavLink to="/productos" className="nav-link mx-3 me-4"><FaShoppingCart /></NavLink>
                    </Nav>
                </Navbar.Collapse >
            </Navbar>
            <MyModal title="Nuevo Usuario" show={showModal} close={() => setShowModal(false)}>
                <SignupForm fireFinalActions={fireFinalActions} />
            </MyModal>
            <MyModal title="Inicia Sesion" show={showModal1} close={() => setShowModal1(false)}>
                <LoginForm fireFinalActions={fireFinalActions} />
            </MyModal>
        </>
    )
}

export default Navigation
